metadata.title: CVE-2024-49951 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  Bluetooth: MGMT: Fix possible crash on mgmt_index_removed  If mgmt_index_removed is called while there are commands queued on cmd_sync it could lead to crashes like the bellow trace:  0x0000053D: __list_del_entry_valid_or_report+0x98/0xdc 0x0000053D: mgmt_pending_remove+0x18/0x58 [bluetooth] 0x0000053E: mgmt_remove_adv_monitor_complete+0x80/0x108 [bluetooth] 0x0000053E: hci_cmd_sync_work+0xbc/0x164 [bluetooth]  So while handling mgmt_index_removed this attempts to dequeue commands passed as user_data to cmd_sync.
